name: Klondike Solitaire by Playfrog
description:
It's believed that no one will say no to the classic windows game Klondike, so why not install it on your iPad?


Klondike is a patience game, which is good to kill time. With this App, you can play it any boring time any boring places.

In our Freecell, you are allowed to undo any steps and get the hints anytime. Tap Move on/off/auto and Lock Orientation is supported. What’s more, You are free to choose Draw 1 Mode or Draw 3 Mode as you like. When Vegas cumulative are selected, the total points is maintained between games.
For the detailed rules, please click the HELP button in game.


This classic game is perfect at leisure time. Instead of computer, experience it on your iPad now!


*****************************************************************
More games:

Spider
Freecell
Solitaire

*****************************************************************

Please feel free to give us any of your feedback. Thanks for your support!
